name: Award Winning Peaches and Cream Pie
author: Debbi Borsick
summary: I am always asked for the recipe when I take this anywhere. Plus I won 5 blue ribbons and Best Pie of Show for this pie. It's a great pie.
ingredients: 1 (3 ounce) package non-instant vanilla pudding mix
1 (29 ounce) can sliced peaches, drained and syrup reserved
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease sides and bottom of a 10 inch deep-dish pie pan
In a medium mixing bowl, mix together flour, salt, baking powder and pudding mix
Mix in butter, egg and milk
Arrange the peach slices on top of the pudding mixture
In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese until fluffy
Add 1/2 cup sugar and 3 tablespoons reserved peach syrup
Spoon mixture over peaches to within 1 inch of pan edge
Mix together 1 tablespoon sugar and 1 teaspoon cinnamon, and sprinkle over top
Bake in preheated oven for 30 to 35 minutes, until golden brown
